I think the Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Many people are leaving the Church. They do not like the Church's views on some things. For example, gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong opinions on these subjects, but its views are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changes its thinking, it will not lose its followers. Some people disagree with the Church on these issues. They do not like the Church's views. They think the Church is wrong.

The Church does not allow women to be priests or for priests to be married. Many people do not think this is fair. They think priests should be able to have families like other people. The Church says priests are married to God and devoted to their work. But other people have jobs and families too.

I do not think it is fair for priests to be different from everyone else. They should be able to have both a job and a family. This would make the Church more accepting and fair.

I am not opposed to gay marriage. I believe people are born with their sexual orientation. They do not choose it. It is not something they can control. 

Gay people should not be blamed for being gay. They should not be treated unfairly because of who they are. 

It is not right to say a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. This is not fair.

People are born gay. They are not born straight. It is not a choice. They should not be punished for being gay.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can get married. Marriage is not a matter for the government. It is a personal thing. 

The government should not tell people they are wrong for being gay. They should not punish them for being who they are. 

The government should not interfere in people's lives. They should not decide who people can love and marry. 

People should be free to love who they want and get married if they want. The government should not stop them.

I think gay marriage should be legal. Here's why:

There's no good reason not to. Many people think gay couples threaten the traditional family, but that's not true. It's different, but it's not the same.

Gay couples have the right to the same civil rights as everyone else. They should be able to visit each other in the hospital and make decisions about each other's care. It's not fair to call them anything less than family.

Many studies show that gay couples are like other couples in many ways. They have the same chance of a happy and successful relationship. They just want a marriage certificate, not a church wedding.

If we separate church and state, there's no reason to deny gay couples the same rights as everyone else. It's like segregation - separate but unequal.

Some people worry about adoption and how gay couples will affect their community. But kids from gay parents are the same as kids from straight parents. They need love and support, not a certain kind of family.

People worry about how kids will turn out, but it's not fair to blame a child's parents for their choices. Gay couples can be just as good parents as straight couples.

I think the government should help make gay marriage legal everywhere. The amendment to ban it is unfair. President Bush's views on this are based on his own morals, but morality can be different from person to person.

Some people believe gay people are damaged or have a personality problem, but that's not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not popular opinion.

If we listen to people who know, we might see things differently. We should treat everyone equal, regardless of their orientation.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I want to say something about marijuana. Just because a drug is illegal does not mean it has good qualities. I think it is not good to make marijuana available to the public. But I do think it can be good for medical use. If a drug is illegal, it does not mean it has no good qualities. I think people should be able to use its good qualities.

There are some medicines that are illegal, but doctors use them. For example, oxycotton, Vicodin, and Perocets. They are controlled medicines, but they are good for people. If we do not use marijuana because it is taboo, that is not fair. We should look at its good qualities.

Marijuana is different from alcohol. If you use too much marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you use too much alcohol, it can also cause problems. It is a difficult issue. I think we should make marijuana legal, but slowly. If we make it legal all at once, people might use it too much. But if we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly.

People think marijuana is bad because it is an illegal drug. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, people might use it for medical reasons.

The church has changed a lot in the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was a child, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a nice dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I attended a private school and saw my friends at church on weekends.

The church now has a special service for teenagers. It lasts only 30 minutes. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes or jeans and khakis. In the past, people dressed up for church. Now it is more casual.

I do not know about the church's politics. But I think the biggest change I see is how people dress.

The church has been accused of problems with priests and pedophilia. I do not think allowing priests to marry or allowing female priests would have prevented these problems. Some married men are still pedophiles. It is the person, not the marriage or the job, that causes the problem.

People choose to become priests. If they want to be married, they should choose a different religion. There are religions that allow priests to be married. 

I think pedophilia is a genetic problem. People are born with it. It is not something they become. Genetics play a big role in it. The church cannot stop people from being born with these tendencies.

If the church knew about the problems and tried to hide them, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first. But then the September 11th attacks happened. The US went to war in Iraq for many reasons. Some people think that the Bush administration used the war as a reason to take action. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this has been proven wrong.

The Bush administration told the American people that Iraq was connected to the September 11th attacks. They said Saddam Hussein was like Osama Bin Laden. But this was a lie.

This makes me very upset. Colin Powell, the former Secretary of State, said he was not sure about the evidence. He was unsure even when he was presenting it to the United Nations.

I think this is very wrong. The Bush administration should have told the truth to the American people. This is a serious mistake. It is against the law for a president to lie.

The Bush administration did not respect the US Constitution. They tried to make it less important. They wanted to go to war.

One of the former Treasury Secretaries said that President Bush wanted to go to war because of a personal reason. He wanted to avenge his father's failed war with Iraq.

I think the war has gone on too long. If the US leaves now, there could be more violence and people could die. The US and the United Nations are trying to find a solution. They want to get other countries like Syria and Saudi Arabia involved to help restore order.

But I am not sure this is a good idea. It could make more problems in the long run. Iraq's government is weak. The parliament is not working well. The Prime Minister does not have much control. There are many groups fighting for power.

I do not have a good answer to this problem.

I have thoughts about the War in Iraq. I feel it is not a good idea. The war was not officially declared by the U.S. government. I think we went to war because of the September 11 attacks. Iraq was blamed for the attacks. I am not very informed about the war. But I know that our goal is to help Iraq build a democracy. We also want to control their oil. However, I think this is not a good reason to stay in Iraq. The war makes many people unhappy. If we stay in Iraq, we will have to make them like us. This will take a long time. If we leave, they will be angry with us. They will have to start all over. I am not sure what to think.

I think the war should continue, but we should not call it a war anymore. We only use guns to show that we are strong. I do not think this is a good reason to stay in Iraq. The war was not officially declared by Congress. This is important. Congress must declare a war before it starts. I do not think it is fair to stay in Iraq. We are wasting our resources. I also feel bad for President Bush. He is making a bad decision. It is like the Vietnam War. That war was not officially declared either. It was called a meaningless war. Now, President Bush is being called a bad president for starting this war. I know some families who have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want the war to end because it is hurting them. But I also do not want to leave them behind. They have lives too. However, if we stay in Iraq, we will try to change their culture. This will make things worse. The Al-Kaida group will get stronger and they will hate us more. I think the war will last for a long time.

I do not think a government should make something legal or not.  I think this is a decision for churches to make. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is clear. It is stated very clearly in the Constitution. If a government tries to make a law about it, they would be going against the Constitution.

I think people who want to make something illegal are choosing which church's beliefs are right and which are wrong. Many Catholics and Christians do not support it. But I do not think the government can tell churches what to do. The government's job is to protect people's freedom to believe what they want.

The separation of church and state has been a key part of the Constitution. It helps us have religious freedom in the United States. If we had an amendment about this, it would be against what is already in the Constitution. It would also be one of the only amendments that helps the government, not the people. I do not think this is right.

I do not believe the government should be involved in this issue. The president's push for this amendment is because of his own personal feelings. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide what is right or wrong, not the government.

I do not see how this amendment will help the country. It may even make things better. I do not think there is a good reason to make this amendment except for people's personal opinions.

The war in Iraq. I think the US government was not honest with Americans about why we went to war. They said we went to war because of the terrorist attacks on September 11th. But the two things are not closely connected. The government made the American people believe this, using their anger towards the terrorists. In 2003, the US invaded Iraq.

I am against war, especially a surprise attack. I think the war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. The US government should have learned from its past mistakes.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. This is sad. The US government removed the Iraqi government, but it did not prepare for the problems that would come after. There was chaos and a power vacuum. Now the US is trying to put a democracy in Iraq, but it is a difficult process.

In the past, the US tried to do the same thing in Vietnam. They wanted to remove the Communists and put a democracy in place. But it did not work well. It was a long and hard process. The US government should have known this.

If the US is going to go to war, it must be prepared for all outcomes. The government was not prepared for the problems in Iraq. Many American soldiers are still dying, and the Iraqi troops are still learning how to police their own country. It takes time to build a new government.

I think the US government tried to deceive the American people. They made it seem like the war would be easy and short. But it is not that simple. Democracy is not easy to create. In the US, it took a long time to build our democracy.

I was thinking about the presidential election in 2004. I wanted to give President Bush a chance to finish what he started. But now, it's hard to leave Iraq. The US took away their government and way of life. We can't just leave now.

However, we must also think about the many American casualties. How many lives are we willing to risk for a free Iraq? The reason we invaded Iraq was to make it a democracy, but why not do the same in other countries? I think the real reason is the oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq.

Before the war, the US said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were not found. Why did the US not attack North Korea, which actually had those weapons? I don't think the US government is honest or thorough in its decisions.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But I don't think that will happen soon.

I am in favor of gay marriage.  I have always been.  I think it is a personal preference.  Recently, science has shown that it may be biological, not caused by society.  This makes it unfair for people to be treated differently because of something they cannot control.  I believe it is inhumane.

I think politics and government should not interfere with personal matters.  Marriage is a personal choice, not a government issue.  In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who are not married because of the law.  But they live like any other family.  They walk their dogs and do other normal things.

I do not agree with President Bush and others who try to define marriage in their own way.  I think this is ridiculous.

I have read and heard that some people may be born with a chemical in their brain that makes them gay.  This is different from growing up in a certain way.  So, it may not be a choice.

The main problem is that marriage is a private matter.  If a man and woman want to get married, they can do it secretly.  But if two people of the same sex want to get married, it is a big public issue.  I think marriage should be a private matter, not a public one.

No, I do not agree with that.

When you put something on the internet, it becomes public. It can be seen by everyone. You cannot control what people think about you later. 

As a Resident Advisor, I have already dealt with this issue. When you put something on the internet, it can affect people's opinions of you. If you talk about bad things, like violence or shootings, people will talk about it. You cannot control what they say.

The internet is public. If you have friends on Myspace or Facebook, they can see your messages. The school administration must take notice of these messages. They cannot ignore them. If they do, something bad might happen, and they could have prevented it.

But, some people just joke around on the internet. It can be hard to know what is serious and what is not. In our school, something like this happened. A student was overheard saying something, and someone reported it to the school. We found out who said it and looked at their Facebook page. They had posted some things that might seem funny, but were not funny in that situation.

When you put something on the internet, it is not private. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it there. You cannot control what people think or take seriously. School officials should not be friends with their students on the internet. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to take it seriously.

For example, a teacher should not make a fake Facebook account to friend their students. That is not right. I wouldn't want to be friends with my residents on the internet, either. I don't want to know about their private lives. If they post things on Facebook, that's not my problem.

I think the war has gone on for too long. I think the purpose of the war was good at first. It was to help another country have a fair government. But now, I think we are fighting mainly to show we are a strong country. I do not think this is a good reason.

I think the original motivation was to help a country with no fair government. If there were other reasons, I do not think it was a good idea. I think we made our point in the first few months. But the war has gone on for many years. I think it is too long.

I think our purpose has changed over time. I think we started the war to help a country, but now we are fighting just to fight. We do not want to leave without winning. 

I think the war should end now. The country's government will have to help itself soon. I think this time has come. We are spending a lot of money on the war. We have problems in our own country, like poverty and poor schools. We should spend our money on these things.

We are spending billions of dollars on the war. War should not be a long-term expense. We have other problems that need our money, like health care and public roads. Our own citizens are getting hurt in the war. I think this money could be spent better.

I think that is all I want to say.

I have a question. You were not allowed to [REWRITE: participate in an activity] because someone looked at your personal information on the internet. They found it on Myspace. Myspace is a website where people can share information about themselves. If you want to see someone's information on Myspace, you must be a friend with them. This means you have agreed to let them see your information too.

When you put information on the internet, many people can see it. This is something you should understand. 

I think it's good that someone found that information and was able to stop something bad from happening.

But it's not fair to watch everyone's information all the time. It's not fair to pick on some people and not others. And it's not right to have someone's job be to look at everyone's information.

I don't have a Myspace, but I have Facebook. It bothers me that people can see things about me. I saw a show on TV that showed how easy it is for people to get information from the internet. They can even find out personal things like your school schedule.

On Facebook, people can see your photos and your friends. They can even find out where you are during the day. But the point of Facebook is to communicate with friends. I don't want to limit what I put up, but it's hard because you never know who can see it.

I only accept friends I know, but I still worry about who can see my information. My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I think that's strange. I don't know if the school had the right to tell students what they can and cannot do.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I was against it from the start, but now it's not as important. Everyone agrees it was a bad idea, except the people in the government who made the decision. They do not want to admit their mistake.

Polls show that 75 to 80% of people around the world think the war was a bad idea. This is true in Iraq, where 80% of people think the war was a bad idea. Even 70% of the US soldiers in Iraq think the war was a bad idea and that we should leave in a year.

The war was already a problem before we went in. Now, leaving is also a problem. It's hard to know what to do in the Middle East. We have a big difference in culture between the US and Middle Eastern countries. The US thought it could bring democracy to Iraq, but the people of Iraq would have made different choices.

Saddam was a bad leader, but we should have thought about the pros and cons before going to war. The war has made things worse. We should leave Iraq now.

I don't see a reason to stay in Iraq. The US government has ideas about why we should stay, but I do not agree. I think it's better to leave now. Many Iraqis want us to leave, and we should listen to them.

If we ask Iraqis what to do, they want us to leave. They know their country better than we do. If we leave and things get worse, we can say, "We did what you asked us to do." We can help Iraq after we leave, but we will not be heroes in the Middle East. We can at least say we tried to do the right thing.

I think there is still a problem with different treatment of men and women in the United States. This is not just for women, but also for men in some jobs. Many people have a hard time working below a woman because of how society has been since a long time ago. 

Women often see a job they can do and have good qualifications for it, but the group in charge does not choose them for the job because historically, women do not usually work in high positions. The same thing happens to men in jobs like fashion or being a parent at home. People often look down on men who stay home to take care of children because society thinks they should be working to make money.

In the fashion industry, some people do not take men seriously if they are interested in fashion. This is because men who like fashion often have different styles of life. People may think that men who like fashion do not know what fashion is for women. 

Society has a set way of thinking, but it is changing slowly. Women are doing better in their jobs and becoming leaders. Men are also staying home to take care of their children and people are starting to accept this. If we continue working at this pace, I think the problem will be solved. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often discriminated against, but we should not force it. If we do it too fast, people will resist. We have made a lot of progress and change takes time.

People can also be discriminated against because of where they are from. If someone from a farm goes to a high position in a company, others might look down on them because of their accent. This is another example of how people can be discriminated against.

My understanding is that marijuana is no longer a crime. It has been made legal by law. They changed it from a crime to a traffic ticket. When you get caught with marijuana, you get a ticket, not arrested or punished. This is good for people who have jobs. It is bad to have a drug charge because it affects your future. But if it is not a crime, it is better.

Some people think it is not good to make marijuana legal because it costs a lot to arrest and punish people. They think it is better to use that money for important things like education, help for the elderly, and food for people who do not have enough.

In some cities, people do not want marijuana to be legal because they do not agree with it. But in some places, like Denver, people are more open-minded. They think it is a good idea to make money from it to help the city.

I do not think marijuana should be everywhere like cigarettes. It is still not accepted in some places. If it is sold openly, it might be bad. Some people think it is not good to smoke and drive. They also think it is not good for people's lifestyles.

Alcohol is bad for people's driving skills. Marijuana can be bad for people's behavior. Both substances have bad effects. But people react differently to them. Some people can use them and be fine, but some people cannot.

I think both substances are bad for people. We should not generalize about them because people are different. We should think about the bad effects and decide what is best.

I agree with this idea. 
Because 
Many things in the Catholic Church are old customs. 
They do things the same way for a long time. 
It's good to have these traditions. 
But it's also important to adapt to change. 
Many Catholics go to church every week. 
They are strict about how things are done. 
Sometimes, the Catholic Church does not accept people who do not follow the rules exactly. 
They also do not accept people of other religions. 
My mom was an Episcopalian. 
My dad was an Episcopalian. 
My mom was a Catholic. 
The Catholic Church would not marry my parents because of my dad's religion. 
This is not being kind to others. 
We always learn to love others in the Catholic Church. 
But it's not kind to say love others and not accept them. 
So, I think some Catholic teachings are good. 
But the way the church acts is not always the same. 
It's old-fashioned and they do not change. 
I don't think allowing priests to be married would stop them from hurting children. 
Those people will do bad things no matter what. 
A child is not the same as a spouse. 
They will do bad things if they want to. 

For example, people who hurt children will do that anyway. 
It's not because they are married or not married. 
So, I don't think allowing priests to be married would help.

I have thought about this issue, but I do not have a strong opinion yet. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong. This is a very difficult topic. The relationship between church and state is a problem. And defining marriage is also hard. It is hard to make a decision without hurting someone's feelings. I do not know what to think.

I think that all civil unions are the same. Marriage is not just a government decision. It is a personal choice. People get tax breaks and special treatment if they are married. This is not fair if it only happens to some people. If two people want to be together, they should be able to. It is not up to the government to decide what kind of marriage it is.

Some people want to allow gay marriage. This means two people of the same sex can be married. I think this is fair. They can have a civil union like anyone else.

If all states can agree on this, it should become a national law. But changing the constitution to say gay marriage is bad is not a good idea. The constitution is for big important issues, not for small ones.

It is not important enough to change the constitution to say gay marriage is not allowed. This is just a simple issue.

No.

I was raised in a Christian home. I have mixed feelings about homosexuality. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be allowed. Each state should decide for itself, not the president.

I think many states are Democratic or Republican. Democratic states often support gay marriage. If you live in a state that supports gay marriage, you should respect that decision. You chose to live there, so you should accept their laws.

I believe homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. So, it should be up to each state whether or not to allow gay marriage.

I already said that. I do not think the president should decide what each state can or cannot do. The president is not in every state, so he should not make decisions for all states.

I think some things should be left to the individual states. The president will be out of office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will just go back and forth. Each state should make its own decision because they will live with it.

I do not think so.

I don't think the school officials acted wrong. Myspace is a public place on the internet. If you post something there, you know it's for everyone to see. School officials can see it even if it's not under the school's name. They can see it from home.

If they see something that could stop a school shooting, they have the right to see it. They have a responsibility to keep students safe. If they go on Myspace to check if students are doing things they shouldn't, that's okay. They want to keep the school safe and good.

But if they go on just to get students in trouble, that's not okay. I think it's an invasion of privacy. However, if they can make the school a safer place, I don't think it's a problem.

It's easy to say things on the internet, but you never know who will see them. If you say something bad about someone, it can come back to hurt you. If you post something on the internet, it's always there. If you do something bad, you will get in trouble.

I don't think it was an invasion of privacy. School officials are trying to keep the school safe. If they see something that can help, they should see it.

I don't think they should go on the internet just to catch students. But if they see something that can make the school safer, that's okay. If they go on the internet to help keep students safe, it's not a problem.

They were just trying to keep the school safe. They were trying to prevent something bad from happening. They were trying to stop something like the Columbine school shooting.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I thought it was a good idea because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to help stop the people who did it. I thought we should go over there and make them stop fighting with each other. But I was not prepared for the long-term effects.

I think we made a mistake by going to war without a clear plan. We just went in without thinking about the problems we might face. War is different for them than it is for us. They think about war in a way that is very different from how we think about it. They want to fight for their country, but I don't think they want to make their country better.

We went to war for revenge, and because the people wanted to go. President Bush thought it was the right thing to do. But I think he should have thought more carefully about the consequences. We couldn't just let them go on hurting people, but we should have had a better plan to help them.

I don't think we can change them. They will always be like that. We are not the right people to change them. I think we are just causing problems for ourselves by staying there. We are wasting our time and resources. We can't stay in their country forever. Once we leave, things will fall apart again. We are not making enough progress, and it's time to go home.

I think the Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Many people are leaving the Church. They do not like the Church's views on some things. For example, gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong opinions on these subjects, but its views are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changes its thinking, it will not lose its followers. Some people disagree with the Church on these issues. They do not like the Church's views. They think the Church is wrong.

The Church does not allow women to be priests or for priests to be married. Many people do not think this is fair. They think priests should be able to have families like other people. The Church says priests are married to God and devoted to their work. But other people have jobs and families too.

I do not think it is fair for priests to be different from everyone else. They should be able to have both a job and a family. This would make the Church more accepting and fair.

I am not opposed to gay marriage. I believe people are born with their sexual orientation. They do not choose it. It is not something they can control. 

Gay people should not be blamed for being gay. They should not be treated unfairly because of who they are. 

It is not right to say a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. This is not fair.

People are born gay. They are not born straight. It is not a choice. They should not be punished for being gay.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can get married. Marriage is not a matter for the government. It is a personal thing. 

The government should not tell people they are wrong for being gay. They should not punish them for being who they are. 

The government should not interfere in people's lives. They should not decide who people can love and marry. 

People should be free to love who they want and get married if they want. The government should not stop them.

I think gay marriage should be legal. Here's why:

There's no good reason not to. Many people think gay couples threaten the traditional family, but that's not true. It's different, but it's not the same.

Gay couples have the right to the same civil rights as everyone else. They should be able to visit each other in the hospital and make decisions about each other's care. It's not fair to call them anything less than family.

Many studies show that gay couples are like other couples in many ways. They have the same chance of a happy and successful relationship. They just want a marriage certificate, not a church wedding.

If we separate church and state, there's no reason to deny gay couples the same rights as everyone else. It's like segregation - separate but unequal.

Some people worry about adoption and how gay couples will affect their community. But kids from gay parents are the same as kids from straight parents. They need love and support, not a certain kind of family.

People worry about how kids will turn out, but it's not fair to blame a child's parents for their choices. Gay couples can be just as good parents as straight couples.

I think the government should help make gay marriage legal everywhere. The amendment to ban it is unfair. President Bush's views on this are based on his own morals, but morality can be different from person to person.

Some people believe gay people are damaged or have a personality problem, but that's not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not popular opinion.

If we listen to people who know, we might see things differently. We should treat everyone equal, regardless of their orientation.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I want to say something about marijuana. Just because a drug is illegal does not mean it has good qualities. I think it is not good to make marijuana available to the public. But I do think it can be good for medical use. If a drug is illegal, it does not mean it has no good qualities. I think people should be able to use its good qualities.

There are some medicines that are illegal, but doctors use them. For example, oxycotton, Vicodin, and Perocets. They are controlled medicines, but they are good for people. If we do not use marijuana because it is taboo, that is not fair. We should look at its good qualities.

Marijuana is different from alcohol. If you use too much marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you use too much alcohol, it can also cause problems. It is a difficult issue. I think we should make marijuana legal, but slowly. If we make it legal all at once, people might use it too much. But if we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly.

People think marijuana is bad because it is an illegal drug. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, people might use it for medical reasons.

The church has changed a lot in the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was a child, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a nice dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I attended a private school and saw my friends at church on weekends.

The church now has a special service for teenagers. It lasts only 30 minutes. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes or jeans and khakis. In the past, people dressed up for church. Now it is more casual.

I do not know about the church's politics. But I think the biggest change I see is how people dress.

The church has been accused of problems with priests and pedophilia. I do not think allowing priests to marry or allowing female priests would have prevented these problems. Some married men are still pedophiles. It is the person, not the marriage or the job, that causes the problem.

People choose to become priests. If they want to be married, they should choose a different religion. There are religions that allow priests to be married. 

I think pedophilia is a genetic problem. People are born with it. It is not something they become. Genetics play a big role in it. The church cannot stop people from being born with these tendencies.

If the church knew about the problems and tried to hide them, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first. But then the September 11th attacks happened. The US went to war in Iraq for many reasons. Some people think that the Bush administration used the war as a reason to take action. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this has been proven wrong.

The Bush administration told the American people that Iraq was connected to the September 11th attacks. They said Saddam Hussein was like Osama Bin Laden. But this was a lie.

This makes me very upset. Colin Powell, the former Secretary of State, said he was not sure about the evidence. He was unsure even when he was presenting it to the United Nations.

I think this is very wrong. The Bush administration should have told the truth to the American people. This is a serious mistake. It is against the law for a president to lie.

The Bush administration did not respect the US Constitution. They tried to make it less important. They wanted to go to war.

One of the former Treasury Secretaries said that President Bush wanted to go to war because of a personal reason. He wanted to avenge his father's failed war with Iraq.

I think the war has gone on too long. If the US leaves now, there could be more violence and people could die. The US and the United Nations are trying to find a solution. They want to get other countries like Syria and Saudi Arabia involved to help restore order.

But I am not sure this is a good idea. It could make more problems in the long run. Iraq's government is weak. The parliament is not working well. The Prime Minister does not have much control. There are many groups fighting for power.

I do not have a good answer to this problem.

I have thoughts about the War in Iraq. I feel it is not a good idea. The war was not officially declared by the U.S. government. I think we went to war because of the September 11 attacks. Iraq was blamed for the attacks. I am not very informed about the war. But I know that our goal is to help Iraq build a democracy. We also want to control their oil. However, I think this is not a good reason to stay in Iraq. The war makes many people unhappy. If we stay in Iraq, we will have to make them like us. This will take a long time. If we leave, they will be angry with us. They will have to start all over. I am not sure what to think.

I think the war should continue, but we should not call it a war anymore. We only use guns to show that we are strong. I do not think this is a good reason to stay in Iraq. The war was not officially declared by Congress. This is important. Congress must declare a war before it starts. I do not think it is fair to stay in Iraq. We are wasting our resources. I also feel bad for President Bush. He is making a bad decision. It is like the Vietnam War. That war was not officially declared either. It was called a meaningless war. Now, President Bush is being called a bad president for starting this war. I know some families who have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want the war to end because it is hurting them. But I also do not want to leave them behind. They have lives too. However, if we stay in Iraq, we will try to change their culture. This will make things worse. The Al-Kaida group will get stronger and they will hate us more. I think the war will last for a long time.

I do not think a government should make something legal or not.  I think this is a decision for churches to make. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is clear. It is stated very clearly in the Constitution. If a government tries to make a law about it, they would be going against the Constitution.

I think people who want to make something illegal are choosing which church's beliefs are right and which are wrong. Many Catholics and Christians do not support it. But I do not think the government can tell churches what to do. The government's job is to protect people's freedom to believe what they want.

The separation of church and state has been a key part of the Constitution. It helps us have religious freedom in the United States. If we had an amendment about this, it would be against what is already in the Constitution. It would also be one of the only amendments that helps the government, not the people. I do not think this is right.

I do not believe the government should be involved in this issue. The president's push for this amendment is because of his own personal feelings. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide what is right or wrong, not the government.

I do not see how this amendment will help the country. It may even make things better. I do not think there is a good reason to make this amendment except for people's personal opinions.

The war in Iraq. I think the US government was not honest with Americans about why we went to war. They said we went to war because of the terrorist attacks on September 11th. But the two things are not closely connected. The government made the American people believe this, using their anger towards the terrorists. In 2003, the US invaded Iraq.

I am against war, especially a surprise attack. I think the war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. The US government should have learned from its past mistakes.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. This is sad. The US government removed the Iraqi government, but it did not prepare for the problems that would come after. There was chaos and a power vacuum. Now the US is trying to put a democracy in Iraq, but it is a difficult process.

In the past, the US tried to do the same thing in Vietnam. They wanted to remove the Communists and put a democracy in place. But it did not work well. It was a long and hard process. The US government should have known this.

If the US is going to go to war, it must be prepared for all outcomes. The government was not prepared for the problems in Iraq. Many American soldiers are still dying, and the Iraqi troops are still learning how to police their own country. It takes time to build a new government.

I think the US government tried to deceive the American people. They made it seem like the war would be easy and short. But it is not that simple. Democracy is not easy to create. In the US, it took a long time to build our democracy.

I was thinking about the presidential election in 2004. I wanted to give President Bush a chance to finish what he started. But now, it's hard to leave Iraq. The US took away their government and way of life. We can't just leave now.

However, we must also think about the many American casualties. How many lives are we willing to risk for a free Iraq? The reason we invaded Iraq was to make it a democracy, but why not do the same in other countries? I think the real reason is the oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq.

Before the war, the US said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were not found. Why did the US not attack North Korea, which actually had those weapons? I don't think the US government is honest or thorough in its decisions.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But I don't think that will happen soon.

I am in favor of gay marriage.  I have always been.  I think it is a personal preference.  Recently, science has shown that it may be biological, not caused by society.  This makes it unfair for people to be treated differently because of something they cannot control.  I believe it is inhumane.

I think politics and government should not interfere with personal matters.  Marriage is a personal choice, not a government issue.  In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who are not married because of the law.  But they live like any other family.  They walk their dogs and do other normal things.

I do not agree with President Bush and others who try to define marriage in their own way.  I think this is ridiculous.

I have read and heard that some people may be born with a chemical in their brain that makes them gay.  This is different from growing up in a certain way.  So, it may not be a choice.

The main problem is that marriage is a private matter.  If a man and woman want to get married, they can do it secretly.  But if two people of the same sex want to get married, it is a big public issue.  I think marriage should be a private matter, not a public one.

No, I do not agree with that.

When you put something on the internet, it becomes public. It can be seen by everyone. You cannot control what people think about you later. 

As a Resident Advisor, I have already dealt with this issue. When you put something on the internet, it can affect people's opinions of you. If you talk about bad things, like violence or shootings, people will talk about it. You cannot control what they say.

The internet is public. If you have friends on Myspace or Facebook, they can see your messages. The school administration must take notice of these messages. They cannot ignore them. If they do, something bad might happen, and they could have prevented it.

But, some people just joke around on the internet. It can be hard to know what is serious and what is not. In our school, something like this happened. A student was overheard saying something, and someone reported it to the school. We found out who said it and looked at their Facebook page. They had posted some things that might seem funny, but were not funny in that situation.

When you put something on the internet, it is not private. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it there. You cannot control what people think or take seriously. School officials should not be friends with their students on the internet. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to take it seriously.

For example, a teacher should not make a fake Facebook account to friend their students. That is not right. I wouldn't want to be friends with my residents on the internet, either. I don't want to know about their private lives. If they post things on Facebook, that's not my problem.

I think the war has gone on for too long. I think the purpose of the war was good at first. It was to help another country have a fair government. But now, I think we are fighting mainly to show we are a strong country. I do not think this is a good reason.

I think the original motivation was to help a country with no fair government. If there were other reasons, I do not think it was a good idea. I think we made our point in the first few months. But the war has gone on for many years. I think it is too long.

I think our purpose has changed over time. I think we started the war to help a country, but now we are fighting just to fight. We do not want to leave without winning. 

I think the war should end now. The country's government will have to help itself soon. I think this time has come. We are spending a lot of money on the war. We have problems in our own country, like poverty and poor schools. We should spend our money on these things.

We are spending billions of dollars on the war. War should not be a long-term expense. We have other problems that need our money, like health care and public roads. Our own citizens are getting hurt in the war. I think this money could be spent better.

I think that is all I want to say.

I have a question. You were not allowed to [REWRITE: participate in an activity] because someone looked at your personal information on the internet. They found it on Myspace. Myspace is a website where people can share information about themselves. If you want to see someone's information on Myspace, you must be a friend with them. This means you have agreed to let them see your information too.

When you put information on the internet, many people can see it. This is something you should understand. 

I think it's good that someone found that information and was able to stop something bad from happening.

But it's not fair to watch everyone's information all the time. It's not fair to pick on some people and not others. And it's not right to have someone's job be to look at everyone's information.

I don't have a Myspace, but I have Facebook. It bothers me that people can see things about me. I saw a show on TV that showed how easy it is for people to get information from the internet. They can even find out personal things like your school schedule.

On Facebook, people can see your photos and your friends. They can even find out where you are during the day. But the point of Facebook is to communicate with friends. I don't want to limit what I put up, but it's hard because you never know who can see it.

I only accept friends I know, but I still worry about who can see my information. My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I think that's strange. I don't know if the school had the right to tell students what they can and cannot do.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I was against it from the start, but now it's not as important. Everyone agrees it was a bad idea, except the people in the government who made the decision. They do not want to admit their mistake.

Polls show that 75 to 80% of people around the world think the war was a bad idea. This is true in Iraq, where 80% of people think the war was a bad idea. Even 70% of the US soldiers in Iraq think the war was a bad idea and that we should leave in a year.

The war was already a problem before we went in. Now, leaving is also a problem. It's hard to know what to do in the Middle East. We have a big difference in culture between the US and Middle Eastern countries. The US thought it could bring democracy to Iraq, but the people of Iraq would have made different choices.

Saddam was a bad leader, but we should have thought about the pros and cons before going to war. The war has made things worse. We should leave Iraq now.

I don't see a reason to stay in Iraq. The US government has ideas about why we should stay, but I do not agree. I think it's better to leave now. Many Iraqis want us to leave, and we should listen to them.

If we ask Iraqis what to do, they want us to leave. They know their country better than we do. If we leave and things get worse, we can say, "We did what you asked us to do." We can help Iraq after we leave, but we will not be heroes in the Middle East. We can at least say we tried to do the right thing.

I think there is still a problem with different treatment of men and women in the United States. This is not just for women, but also for men in some jobs. Many people have a hard time working below a woman because of how society has been since a long time ago. 

Women often see a job they can do and have good qualifications for it, but the group in charge does not choose them for the job because historically, women do not usually work in high positions. The same thing happens to men in jobs like fashion or being a parent at home. People often look down on men who stay home to take care of children because society thinks they should be working to make money.

In the fashion industry, some people do not take men seriously if they are interested in fashion. This is because men who like fashion often have different styles of life. People may think that men who like fashion do not know what fashion is for women. 

Society has a set way of thinking, but it is changing slowly. Women are doing better in their jobs and becoming leaders. Men are also staying home to take care of their children and people are starting to accept this. If we continue working at this pace, I think the problem will be solved. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often discriminated against, but we should not force it. If we do it too fast, people will resist. We have made a lot of progress and change takes time.

People can also be discriminated against because of where they are from. If someone from a farm goes to a high position in a company, others might look down on them because of their accent. This is another example of how people can be discriminated against.

My understanding is that marijuana is no longer a crime. It has been made legal by law. They changed it from a crime to a traffic ticket. When you get caught with marijuana, you get a ticket, not arrested or punished. This is good for people who have jobs. It is bad to have a drug charge because it affects your future. But if it is not a crime, it is better.

Some people think it is not good to make marijuana legal because it costs a lot to arrest and punish people. They think it is better to use that money for important things like education, help for the elderly, and food for people who do not have enough.

In some cities, people do not want marijuana to be legal because they do not agree with it. But in some places, like Denver, people are more open-minded. They think it is a good idea to make money from it to help the city.

I do not think marijuana should be everywhere like cigarettes. It is still not accepted in some places. If it is sold openly, it might be bad. Some people think it is not good to smoke and drive. They also think it is not good for people's lifestyles.

Alcohol is bad for people's driving skills. Marijuana can be bad for people's behavior. Both substances have bad effects. But people react differently to them. Some people can use them and be fine, but some people cannot.

I think both substances are bad for people. We should not generalize about them because people are different. We should think about the bad effects and decide what is best.

I agree with this idea. 
Because 
Many things in the Catholic Church are old customs. 
They do things the same way for a long time. 
It's good to have these traditions. 
But it's also important to adapt to change. 
Many Catholics go to church every week. 
They are strict about how things are done. 
Sometimes, the Catholic Church does not accept people who do not follow the rules exactly. 
They also do not accept people of other religions. 
My mom was an Episcopalian. 
My dad was an Episcopalian. 
My mom was a Catholic. 
The Catholic Church would not marry my parents because of my dad's religion. 
This is not being kind to others. 
We always learn to love others in the Catholic Church. 
But it's not kind to say love others and not accept them. 
So, I think some Catholic teachings are good. 
But the way the church acts is not always the same. 
It's old-fashioned and they do not change. 
I don't think allowing priests to be married would stop them from hurting children. 
Those people will do bad things no matter what. 
A child is not the same as a spouse. 
They will do bad things if they want to. 

For example, people who hurt children will do that anyway. 
It's not because they are married or not married. 
So, I don't think allowing priests to be married would help.

I have thought about this issue, but I do not have a strong opinion yet. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong. This is a very difficult topic. The relationship between church and state is a problem. And defining marriage is also hard. It is hard to make a decision without hurting someone's feelings. I do not know what to think.

I think that all civil unions are the same. Marriage is not just a government decision. It is a personal choice. People get tax breaks and special treatment if they are married. This is not fair if it only happens to some people. If two people want to be together, they should be able to. It is not up to the government to decide what kind of marriage it is.

Some people want to allow gay marriage. This means two people of the same sex can be married. I think this is fair. They can have a civil union like anyone else.

If all states can agree on this, it should become a national law. But changing the constitution to say gay marriage is bad is not a good idea. The constitution is for big important issues, not for small ones.

It is not important enough to change the constitution to say gay marriage is not allowed. This is just a simple issue.

No.

I was raised in a Christian home. I have mixed feelings about homosexuality. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be allowed. Each state should decide for itself, not the president.

I think many states are Democratic or Republican. Democratic states often support gay marriage. If you live in a state that supports gay marriage, you should respect that decision. You chose to live there, so you should accept their laws.

I believe homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. So, it should be up to each state whether or not to allow gay marriage.

I already said that. I do not think the president should decide what each state can or cannot do. The president is not in every state, so he should not make decisions for all states.

I think some things should be left to the individual states. The president will be out of office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will just go back and forth. Each state should make its own decision because they will live with it.

I do not think so.

I don't think the school officials acted wrong. Myspace is a public place on the internet. If you post something there, you know it's for everyone to see. School officials can see it even if it's not under the school's name. They can see it from home.

If they see something that could stop a school shooting, they have the right to see it. They have a responsibility to keep students safe. If they go on Myspace to check if students are doing things they shouldn't, that's okay. They want to keep the school safe and good.

But if they go on just to get students in trouble, that's not okay. I think it's an invasion of privacy. However, if they can make the school a safer place, I don't think it's a problem.

It's easy to say things on the internet, but you never know who will see them. If you say something bad about someone, it can come back to hurt you. If you post something on the internet, it's always there. If you do something bad, you will get in trouble.

I don't think it was an invasion of privacy. School officials are trying to keep the school safe. If they see something that can help, they should see it.

I don't think they should go on the internet just to catch students. But if they see something that can make the school safer, that's okay. If they go on the internet to help keep students safe, it's not a problem.

They were just trying to keep the school safe. They were trying to prevent something bad from happening. They were trying to stop something like the Columbine school shooting.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I thought it was a good idea because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to help stop the people who did it. I thought we should go over there and make them stop fighting with each other. But I was not prepared for the long-term effects.

I think we made a mistake by going to war without a clear plan. We just went in without thinking about the problems we might face. War is different for them than it is for us. They think about war in a way that is very different from how we think about it. They want to fight for their country, but I don't think they want to make their country better.

We went to war for revenge, and because the people wanted to go. President Bush thought it was the right thing to do. But I think he should have thought more carefully about the consequences. We couldn't just let them go on hurting people, but we should have had a better plan to help them.

I don't think we can change them. They will always be like that. We are not the right people to change them. I think we are just causing problems for ourselves by staying there. We are wasting our time and resources. We can't stay in their country forever. Once we leave, things will fall apart again. We are not making enough progress, and it's time to go home.
